mapper.sql: BOOKING_ID , BOOKING_ORDER_NO, BOOKING_ORDER_STATUS, BOOKING_TYPE, SHOP_ID, ROOM_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, BOOKING_PERSON_COUNT, BOOKING_STARTDAY, BOOKING_ENDDAY, BOOKING_STARTTIME, BOOKING_ENDTIME, BOOKING_STATUS, BOOKING_MOBILE, BOOKING_PERSON_NAME, PAY_STATUS, REMARK, `COMMENT`, CHANGE_USER_ID, CHANGE_TIME, CUSTOMER_CHANGE_TIME, BOOKING_TIME, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into tb_booking (BOOKING_ID, BOOKING_ORDER_NO, BOOKING_ORDER_STATUS, BOOKING_TYPE, SHOP_ID, ROOM_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, BOOKING_PERSON_COUNT, BOOKING_STARTDAY, BOOKING_ENDDAY, BOOKING_STARTTIME, BOOKING_ENDTIME, BOOKING_STATUS, BOOKING_MOBILE, BOOKING_PERSON_NAME, PAY_STATUS, REMARK, `COMMENT`, CHANGE_USER_ID, CHANGE_TIME, CUSTOMER_CHANGE_TIME, BOOKING_TIME, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{bookingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bookingOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingOrderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookingPersonCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingStartday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingEndday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingStarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingEndtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{customerChangeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bookingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update tb_booking
BOOKING_ORDER_NO = #{bookingOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOKING_ORDER_STATUS = #{bookingOrderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOKING_TYPE = #{bookingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ROOM_ID = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BOOKING_PERSON_COUNT = #{bookingPersonCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOKING_STARTDAY = #{bookingStartday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOKING_ENDDAY = #{bookingEndday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOKING_STARTTIME = #{bookingStarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOKING_ENDTIME = #{bookingEndtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOKING_STATUS = #{bookingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOKING_MOBILE = #{bookingMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOKING_PERSON_NAME = #{bookingPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_STATUS = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`COMMENT` = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANGE_USER_ID = #{changeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHANGE_TIME = #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CUSTOMER_CHANGE_TIME = #{customerChangeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BOOKING_TIME = #{bookingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = now()
where BOOKING_ID = #{bookingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_booking set BOOKING_ORDER_NO = #{bookingOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOKING_ORDER_STATUS = #{bookingOrderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOKING_TYPE = #{bookingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ROOM_ID = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BOOKING_PERSON_COUNT = #{bookingPersonCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOKING_STARTDAY = #{bookingStartday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOKING_ENDDAY = #{bookingEndday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOKING_STARTTIME = #{bookingStarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOKING_ENDTIME = #{bookingEndtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOKING_STATUS = #{bookingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOKING_MOBILE = #{bookingMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOOKING_PERSON_NAME = #{bookingPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_STATUS = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `COMMENT` = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANGE_USER_ID = #{changeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHANGE_TIME = #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CUSTOMER_CHANGE_TIME = #{customerChangeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BOOKING_TIME = #{bookingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = now() where BOOKING_ID = #{bookingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT T1.BOOKING_ID ,T1.BOOKING_ORDER_NO ,T1.BOOKING_ORDER_STATUS ,T1.BOOKING_TYPE ,T1.SHOP_ID ,(SELECT A1.SHOP_NAME FROM TB_SHOP A1 WHERE A1.SHOP_ID = T1.SHOP_ID) AS SHOP_NAME ,T1.ROOM_ID ,(SELECT A1.ROOM_NAME FROM TB_ROOM A1 WHERE A1.ROOM_ID = T1.ROOM_ID) AS ROOM_NAME ,T1.CUSTOMER_ID ,T1.BOOKING_PERSON_COUNT ,T1.BOOKING_STARTDAY ,T1.BOOKING_ENDDAY ,T1.BOOKING_STARTTIME ,T1.BOOKING_ENDTIME ,T1.BOOKING_STATUS ,(SELECT A1.CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE A1 WHERE A1.CODE_CD = T1.BOOKING_STATUS AND A1.CODE_TYPE = 'BOOKING_STATUS') AS BOOKING_STATUS_NAME ,T1.BOOKING_MOBILE ,T1.BOOKING_PERSON_NAME ,T1.PAY_STATUS ,T1.REMARK ,T1.COMMENT ,T1.CHANGE_USER_ID ,T1.CHANGE_TIME ,T1.CUSTOMER_CHANGE_TIME ,T1.BOOKING_TIME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_BOOKING T1 ORDER BY T1.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT T1.BOOKING_ID ,T1.BOOKING_ORDER_NO ,T1.BOOKING_ORDER_STATUS ,T1.BOOKING_TYPE ,T1.SHOP_ID ,(SELECT A1.SHOP_NAME FROM TB_SHOP A1 WHERE A1.SHOP_ID = T1.SHOP_ID) AS SHOP_NAME ,T1.ROOM_ID ,(SELECT A1.ROOM_NAME FROM TB_ROOM A1 WHERE A1.ROOM_ID = T1.ROOM_ID) AS ROOM_NAME ,T1.CUSTOMER_ID ,T1.BOOKING_PERSON_COUNT ,T1.BOOKING_STARTDAY ,T1.BOOKING_ENDDAY ,T1.BOOKING_STARTTIME ,T1.BOOKING_ENDTIME ,T1.BOOKING_STATUS ,(SELECT A1.CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE A1 WHERE A1.CODE_CD = T1.BOOKING_STATUS AND A1.CODE_TYPE = 'BOOKING_STATUS') AS BOOKING_STATUS_NAME ,T1.BOOKING_MOBILE ,T1.BOOKING_PERSON_NAME ,T1.PAY_STATUS ,T1.REMARK ,T1.COMMENT ,T1.CHANGE_USER_ID ,T1.CHANGE_TIME ,T1.CUSTOMER_CHANGE_TIME ,T1.BOOKING_TIME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_BOOKING T1 WHERE T1.BOOKING_ID = #{bookingId}
